TopicTitle: .23 Full Space Shuttle Mission. Satellite upgrade cargo!

Articles.Content:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=DIRxjchYHd4



Sped Up at Times

My first attempt at a recorded mission.

Mission Details:
Launch from KSC and rendezvous with satellite in low orbit.
Deploy Cargo, and remotely dock cargo with satellite.
Get satellite into higher orbit.
De-Orbit Shuttle and Land.
